chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: A Psalm of David.
items.plainText: A Psalm of David.

items.text: Unto thee, O LORD, do I lift up my soul.
items.plainText: Unto thee, O LORD, do I lift up my soul.

items.text: O my God, I trust in thee: let me not be ashamed, let not mine enemies triumph over me.
items.plainText: O my God, I trust in thee: let me not be ashamed, let not mine enemies triumph over me.

items.text: Yea, let none that wait on thee be ashamed: let them be ashamed which transgress without cause.
items.plainText: Yea, let none that wait on thee be ashamed: let them be ashamed which transgress without cause.

items.text: Shew me thy ways, O LORD; teach me thy paths.
items.plainText: Shew me thy ways, O LORD; teach me thy paths.

items.text: Lead me in thy truth, and teach me: for thou art the God of my salvation; on thee do I wait all the day.
items.plainText: Lead me in thy truth, and teach me: for thou art the God of my salvation; on thee do I wait all the day.

items.text: Remember, O LORD, thy tender mercies and thy lovingkindnesses; for they have been ever of old.
items.plainText: Remember, O LORD, thy tender mercies and thy lovingkindnesses; for they have been ever of old.

items.text: Remember not the sins of my youth, nor my transgressions: according to thy mercy remember thou me for thy goodness' sake, O LORD.
items.plainText: Remember not the sins of my youth, nor my transgressions: according to thy mercy remember thou me for thy goodness' sake, O LORD.

items.text: Good and upright is the LORD: therefore will he teach sinners in the way.
items.plainText: Good and upright is the LORD: therefore will he teach sinners in the way.

items.text: The meek will he guide in judgment: and the meek will he teach his way.
items.plainText: The meek will he guide in judgment: and the meek will he teach his way.

items.text: All the paths of the LORD are mercy and truth unto such as keep his covenant and his testimonies.
items.plainText: All the paths of the LORD are mercy and truth unto such as keep his covenant and his testimonies.

items.text: For thy name's sake, O LORD, pardon mine iniquity; for it is great.
items.plainText: For thy name's sake, O LORD, pardon mine iniquity; for it is great.

items.text: What man is he that feareth the LORD? him shall he teach in the way that he shall choose.
items.plainText: What man is he that feareth the LORD? him shall he teach in the way that he shall choose.

items.text: His soul shall dwell at ease; and his seed shall inherit the earth.
items.plainText: His soul shall dwell at ease; and his seed shall inherit the earth.

items.text: The secret of the LORD is with them that fear him; and he will shew them his covenant.
items.plainText: The secret of the LORD is with them that fear him; and he will shew them his covenant.

items.text: Mine eyes are ever toward the LORD; for he shall pluck my feet out of the net.
items.plainText: Mine eyes are ever toward the LORD; for he shall pluck my feet out of the net.

items.text: Turn thee unto me, and have mercy upon me; for I am desolate and afflicted.
items.plainText: Turn thee unto me, and have mercy upon me; for I am desolate and afflicted.

items.text: The troubles of my heart are enlarged: O bring thou me out of my distresses.
items.plainText: The troubles of my heart are enlarged: O bring thou me out of my distresses.

items.text: Look upon mine affliction and my pain; and forgive all my sins.
items.plainText: Look upon mine affliction and my pain; and forgive all my sins.

items.text: Consider mine enemies; for they are many; and they hate me with cruel hatred.
items.plainText: Consider mine enemies; for they are many; and they hate me with cruel hatred.

items.text: O keep my soul, and deliver me: let me not be ashamed; for I put my trust in thee.
items.plainText: O keep my soul, and deliver me: let me not be ashamed; for I put my trust in thee.

items.text: Let integrity and uprightness preserve me; for I wait on thee.
items.plainText: Let integrity and uprightness preserve me; for I wait on thee.

items.text: Redeem Israel, O God, out of all his troubles.
items.plainText: Redeem Israel, O God, out of all his troubles.
